meta.label: Replay edits
meta.description: Create a dataset of edited cells from the raw event log maintained by the Visual Edit functionality. When the same cell was edited multiple times, the last edit is kept.

inputRoles.name: editlog
inputRoles.label: Edit log
inputRoles.description: Managed by the Visual Edit functionality

outputRoles.name: edits
outputRoles.label: Edits
outputRoles.description: Dataset of edits, containing the edited rows and editable columns

params.name: sep
params.label: ⚠️ DO NOT EDIT THIS RECIPE
params.description: This recipe is controlled by a Visual Edit webapp (see URL in the recipe details, by clicking on the (i) icon in the vertical menu bar on the right-hand side).
